statements: SELECT * FROM MissingPersons;
SELECT person_name, age, location FROM MissingPersons;
SELECT case_id, person_name, date_missing FROM MissingPersons WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT * FROM MissingPersons WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT person_name, description FROM MissingPersons WHERE age < 18;
SELECT * FROM MissingPersons WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY date_missing DESC, case_id
SELECT person_name, location FROM MissingPersons WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND age >= 18
SELECT description FROM MissingPersons WHERE age < 20 AND location = 'Forest'
SELECT person_name, coordinator_name, coordinator_contact FROM MissingPersons ORDER BY case_id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MissingPersons WHERE location LIKE '%Lake%' AND (age >= 20 OR coordinator_name = 'John Doe')
SELECT * FROM missing_persons;
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM missing_persons;
SELECT name, reported_location FROM missing_persons WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM search_efforts WHERE search_location = 'Forest';
SELECT coordinator_name, search_date FROM search_efforts ORDER BY search_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM missing_persons WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, reported_location FROM missing_persons WHERE gender = 'Female' AND last_seen_location = 'Park';
SELECT * FROM search_efforts WHERE search_location IN ('Forest', 'Mountain') ORDER BY search_date DESC, search_location ASC;
SELECT name, age, reported_location, coordinator_name FROM missing_persons JOIN search_efforts ON missing_persons.id = search_efforts.missing_person_id;
SELECT DISTINCT reported_location, last_seen_location FROM missing_persons WHERE age < 18;
SELECT * FROM MissingPersonsCases;
SELECT person_name, age FROM MissingPersonsCases;
SELECT location FROM MissingPersonsCases WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM SearchEfforts ORDER BY search_date DESC;
SELECT search_location, search_team_lead FROM SearchEfforts WHERE search_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MissingPersonsCases;
SELECT case_id, person_name, age FROM MissingPersonsCases WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT search_team_lead, search_location, search_date FROM SearchEfforts ORDER BY search_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude, country FROM GeographicalData WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT person_name, age, missing_date, location FROM MissingPersonsCases WHERE age < 18 ORDER BY missing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MissingPersons;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM MissingPersons WHERE status = 'missing';
SELECT id, name, last_seen_location FROM MissingPersons WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM SearchEfforts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeographicalData WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0;
SELECT * FROM MissingPersons;
SELECT id, name, age FROM MissingPersons WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM SearchEfforts WHERE result='Found' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeographicalData WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < 100;
SELECT p.name, s.search_location FROM MissingPersons p INNER JOIN SearchEfforts s ON p.id = s.volunteer_id WHERE s.date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MissingPersonsCases;
SELECT person_name, age FROM MissingPersonsCases WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM SearchEfforts ORDER BY search_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeographicalData WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT team_lead, search_area FROM SearchTeams WHERE team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM MissingPersonsCases;
SELECT person_name, age, last_known_location FROM MissingPersonsCases WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM SearchEfforts ORDER BY search_date DESC;
SELECT team_lead, search_area FROM SearchTeams WHERE team_lead LIKE '%John%';
SELECT member_name, member_role, team_id FROM SearchTeamMembers WHERE member_role IN ('Rescuer', 'Medic') ORDER BY member_name ASC;
